field.label: Enable ShadowSocks Local
field.help: This will activate the ShadowSocks Local instance. This lets you tunnel your application to a public ShadowSocks server.

field.label: Server Address
field.help: IP address or hostname of the remote ShadowSocks server.

field.label: Password
field.help: Password to authenticate against the remote server.

field.label: Local Address
field.help: IP address to listen to, this should be your LAN IP address.

field.label: Local Port
field.help: The local port of the daemon, default is fine.

field.label: Cipher
field.help: Choose the cipher to use for encryption.
